ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Planes time for ELfson!
ygData.msgSnippet: there ya go you re all set 8) My guild spent a couple days in hate last week and i know the rogues got decked out pretty good, i am not sure what else but i do
ygData.messageBody:
there ya go you're all set 8)

My guild spent a couple days in hate last week and i know the rogues got
decked out pretty good, i am not sure what else but i do know there was only
1 shaman up there and he got his bp, and my other shaman friend that needed
one was logged out up there and none had his pwd to log in to loot the one
that rotted away. What else, i think the only bard that was up there went LD
and a bp rotted away because she could not get back on, i do not know if she
was able to loot the other 2 that dropped, i hope for her sake. Other then
that, we're only 3 bards in guild, and 1 of those is an alt which got decked
out completely second last trip up.

Im just tryin to encourage ya 8) I cant wait to go up. A friend said he'd
help me level up once he got to lev 60, he's 2 bubbles away, i cant wait

-----Original Message-----
From: Legba Work [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: October 5, 2000 10:30 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Planes time for ELfson!


Actually the one group I am friendly with alternate Hate and Fear every
SUnday. Apparantly they have no bards, so she says I will probably be the
only one with them :-)



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
